amendment.description: Amendment to prohibit use of funds in contravention of the 5th or 14th Amendment to the Constitution or title VI of the Civil Rights Act of 1964.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in contravention of the 5th or 14th Amendment to the Constitution or title VI of the Civil Rights Act of 1964.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norton amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.
